features.additionalInfo: Pay weekly, fortnightly or monthly via direct debit. If you pay by any other means, your repayments will be monthly.
Wherever you are in the world, CommBank gives you the choice and control to securely manage all of your accounts on a range of devices, the way you want.

features.additionalValue: Additional repayments and Early Repayment Adjustment
features.additionalInfo: You can make additional repayments up to a total of $1,000 a year without fees applying. Additional repayments made on a Fixed Rate Loan are not available to be redrawn. If you make additional repayments above the annual limit or repay your loan in full, we may charge an Early Repayment Adjustment. We charge this if we estimate we will make a loss as a result of the early repayment.
Interest is fixed so you know what your repayments will be for the life of the loan
You can typically borrow at a lower rate than an unsecured loan by using the car that you own or the car you're buying as security for a secured personal loan

eligibility.additionalInfo: Individuals must have the legal capacity to enter into the loan contract. Not available for non-personal borrowers.

eligibility.additionalValue: Must live in Australia and be either: an Australian citizen, an Australian permanent resident (permanent visa sub class holder), a New Zealand citizen, or eligible non-resident visa holder.

eligibility.additionalInfo: Meet CBA's credit assessment criteria which includes demonstrating the capacity to make the required repayments on the credit facility without substantial hardship.
The maximum number of borrowers eligible to apply per application is one.

eligibility.additionalValue: Purpose of the loan - Buying a car
eligibility.additionalInfo: A Secured Personal Loan can be used for buying a new or used car up to seven years old that doesn't have any finance owing on it. The amount can be for the full or partial purchase price depending on whether you've paid a deposit. You're unable to borrow for additional loan purposes (e.g. a car for $20,000 and furniture for $5,000 is not accepted) when buying a car.

eligibility.additionalValue: Purpose of the loan - All other loan purposes
eligibility.additionalInfo: If you're not buying a car, a Secured Personal Loan can be used for multiple loan purposes where you are able to provide your existing car that's up to seven years old, comprehensively insured and doesn't have any finance owing on it as security for the loan.
The vehicle being used as security must not have any finance owing on it
Individuals must have comprehensive insurance on the vehicle they are using as security

fees.name: Establishment Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Upfront cost payable when accepting a loan.

fees.name: Loan service fee
fees.additionalInfo: Monthly charge to cover costs of keeping account active.

fees.name: Late payment fee
fees.additionalInfo: May be payable on the fifth business day after the repayment due date if at the end of the previous business day your loan is in arrears

fees.name: Early repayment adjustment
fees.additionalValue: If you make additional repayments above the annual limit or repay your loan in full, we may charge an Early Repayment Adjustment. We charge this if we estimate we will make a loss as a result of the early repayment.
fees.additionalInfo: An early repayment adjustment may be made for the loss the Bank expects to make due to the loan being repaid earlier than anticipated. The early repayment adjustment is levied to put the Bank back into the same financial position it would have been in had the loan not been prepaid.

lendingRates.additionalInfo: Minimum rate 6.99%, 1 year loan term. Your interest rate will be based on a number of factors, including the information you provide and our assessment of your application. Interest rates at the lower end of our range may be offered to customers with an excellent credit history. We'll confirm your actual interest rate in your loan offer document. Comparison Rate (minimum rate):11.98% p.a. based on a $10,000 loan over 3 years. Warning: This comparison rate applies only to the example or examples given. Different amounts and terms will result in different comparison rates. Costs such as redraw fees or early repayment fees, and cost savings such as fee waivers, are not included in the comparison rate but may influence the cost of the loan.

To qualify for the green discount, you must use your personal loan to buy an Electric or hybrid car emitting less than 120g CO2 emissions per kilometers. data.name: Secured Personal Loan
data.description: Unlock the value of your car for a typically reduced interest rate.
